name: Motorbike Racing - Moto Racer
description:
*** FREE EXTRA TRACKS FOR LIMITED TIME ***

Motorbike Racing - Moto Racer is a fast paced motor cycle racing game where you control a super bike around a number of courses.

Race, speed, and crash your way through a number of circuits in the best mobile motor bike game, Motorbike Racing - Moto Racer!

Take your motorbike and race against other bikers and win races to unlock more levels and use the accelerometer to control your motorbike as you race other riders to the finish line!

If you love racing games then you are in for a treat.

FEATURES: 
- Advanced bike physics for the most realistic racing on mobile
 - Accelerometer leaning controls your rider's position.
 - Fun and challenging circuits 
- Addictive gameplay.
- Realistic racing physics and intelligent AI means you have to be one step ahead of the rest.
- Working on more levels
